text: Amélie de Montchalin (19 June 1985, Lyon, France) is a French politician and economist, Secretary of State for European Affairs since March 2019. She was a member of the National Assembly between 2017 and 2019. == Biography == Born on June 19, 1985 in Lyon. Graduated from HEC Paris and Harvard Kennedy School.La Kennedy School de Harvard, laboratoire de la macronie Worked at Axa and BNP Paribas. Close to the Juppetismo orbit, although she did not become a member of the UMP/LR, she joined La Republique en Marche in December 2016. She was elected as a deputy to the National Assembly in the 2017 legislative elections for the sixth constituency of Essonne. In March 2019, she was appointed Secretary of State for European Affairs.Amélie de Montchalin, désignée députée de l'année : "Plus la parole d'un député est solitaire, moins elle porte" Following the appointment of Jean Castex as Prime Minister in July 2020, she was appointed Minister for Transformation and the Public Service.Amélie de Montchalin, de l’Europe à la fonction publique == References == Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:French economists Category:Politicians from Lyon Category:Alumni of HEC Paris
title: Amélie de Montchalin
